metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21151 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Processor optimization removal or modification of security-critical codefor some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentiallyenable information disclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-21151` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20220510.0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20220510.0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
